channel.title: Website For Cache Hosting(And other files)
channel.description: I know that a user of the forums done this back in 2010-I know this account is new-, but I haven't heard much about it since. Is it still around? Also, if not, would the community be interested in a new one? I got way too much spare time and have seriously considered developing this type of website. It'd be a full blown file sharing website, but I'd love to specific for the RSPS community to host their cache files or other files.

item.title: Website For Cache Hosting(And other files)
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

When you start hosting the cache and client files, you need to watch out about Jagex coming at you with copyright problems.

I was actually working on a website that’d host everyone’s server sources. You’d supply links to the cache/client from a different website. I stopped this because I started learning Rails and have another website that I must complete.

Read full topic
item.source: Website For Cache Hosting(And other files)

item.title: Website For Cache Hosting(And other files)
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

How would this be any different to any of the large hosting websites?

Read full topic
